channel.title: webview2 on Fred Wieser
channel.description: Recent content in webview2 on Fred Wieser

item.title: overview
item.description: Overview [Documentation] Edge WebView2 is a control that allows for embedding web technologies (HTML/CSS/JS) into native apps. It uses Microsoft Edge as the rendering engine to display the web content in the app. WebView2 provides a hybrid approach between the extremes of websites and PWAs on one end of the spectrum and fully native apps on the other end. Supported platforms: .NET Framework 4.5+ .NET Core 3.1 .NET 5 .NET 6 WinUI 2.
